Most of the work is already complete and we already have some fantastic stories from some brilliant authors, and with your help we can get Volume 1 published by the end of the month by getting even more writers involved to finish off what is already going to be a superb collection. Already we have an amazing cover piece by the award winning artist Tais Teng, and if we raise enough we'd like to pay to do some illustrations too.
Your contributions will also pave the way for future volumes by drawing in talented writers and artist. As a stretch goal, we want each story to have a personalized illustration. But even if we don't reach our goal, those funds raised will still go towards advances for future writers and cover artists.
Most of the work for our first collection is already complete, and we've already begun collecting works for our future volumes. Following the Frank Munsey principle of low production costs and high quality products, we're able to reduce the risks associated with the printing industry to practically zero. Using digital formats, there will be no risk of returns, and by using the crowdfunding model we can ensure that all the funding we need to produce that product is there right from the start.


Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you don't donate, you can still help us out in other ways. Spread the word about our campaign and our upcoming volumes by linking to this indiegogo, our website, facebook page or twitter account. If you do donate, make sure you review the volumes you receive on goodreads or your own blogs and websites. And don't forget to follow us and like our facebook page:


Website
facebook
twitter
YouTube

story:
My Name is Next.

This “woman” dropped me off with some people who were of the same treacherous tribe. I became a missing persons. I ended up with hundreds of other kids and young adults cattled in some warehouse. They approached these men one by one. Every time they would access the flesh and scream NEXT!! A young blonde girl walks up who looks like some child from the back of those milk cartoons. He looks at her, pushes her toward the next level of Dante’s Hell and screams NEXT! Another girl walks up, barely speaks English. Looks like one of those pretty Mexican girls from some small village. Like most of the other girls in the warehouse, she can’t understand him. All I care is that you understand what you must do, he tells her. He pushes her off. NEXT, Another young girl. This time he doesn’t say NEXT. He motions to 2 other men and says: “Teach her a Lesson”.  For the next 5 hours all we heard were her screams. Oh God, I am NEXT! I stood in front of him not knowing what kind of plans were in store. We stayed in this warehouse for God know how long. They gave us little food and allowed little talk. I would hear torturous screams and sob. I was put in isolation . They were in the process of breaking us into sex slaves. One day a truck came for a bunch of us. They took us to the place that represented death- the desert. We were told to wear the negligee provided so training could start. Someone knocked at the door and I find myself shivering in 117 degree weather. This man walks in and I clocked him as he came into the room. Little did I know that my trafficker was behind him. Let’s just say that I know why those little girls in the warehouse shrieked now. When I woke up from that nightmare, I found myself in a darker nightmare. I was being raped by several men. All I heard was NEXT. Whose next? My soul was being raped out of my body. NEXT! This continued for hours. It was a wicked dance of beasts cannibalizing my body. NEXT! What kind of sick men get hard-ons from a carcass! Do you understand? I was just flesh lying there. NEXT? When I heard the last NEXT, nobody was there. I lifted my sore body off of the table and looked at the broken mirror across from me. NEXT, I heard again. Nothing. This time I uttered NEXT and in the reflection in front of me, I saw a vaporous image that would not be clear again for some years to come . . .

 

This is just an example of what is in my book, if you're intrigued please help suppot my publishing cause.  Every contribution will help raise awareness, educate communities, inspire hope and reovery outlet to survivors of all types of abuse and also assist NGO's and Law Enforcement who work so tirelessly to combat this issue.  Help me make a difference.  Thank you! -C. Kim, 2013

story:
`

A Christmas Celebration

Each year, the Kelowna branch of the Canadian Mental Health Association, in partnership with the Mental Health Department of Interior Health Kelowna, hosts a Christmas Celebration for our program participants.

For many, this is the only celebration they experience during this holiday season.

We Are Asking For Your Help

On December 12th, 2013 we will be providing a nutritious meal and gift to over 150 youth and adults experiencing mental illness. We are seeking your financial support and to consider putting these individuals on your virtual christmas shopping list this year.

  • With a $5 donation you are providing a hot nutritious meal for a youth or adult participant.
  • With a $10 donation you will be donating a small gift for someone suffering with a mental illness.
  • With a $30 donation, we will be able to purchase a turkey that our volunteer cooking staff can prepare and carve on this special day.

*Please note: tax receipts can only be given for donations of $20 or more.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, there are many other ways you can help us. If you would like to show your support we welcome you to share this ask with others with your voice, or via social media avenues.

story:
The Story:

"Coffee Shop Conversations; Building Leaders, Growing Relationships," is a book providing Christ-centered tools for thriving in leadership, relationships and life in a fun, casual, coffee-room conversation format! This project is both academic and personal. Academically, Coffee Shop Conversations contains up to date research used by therapists and life coaches to support people in achieving their goals. On the personal side, these are tools that I teach on a daily basis. I have witnessed the powerful impact of the tools taught in this book in the lives of others and have experienced this life changing impact myself. If you would like to hear more about my story, you can watch it here: My Story

This project began out of a need for a supplemental textbook for our
Theological Foundations of Counseling class. We needed a book with a high regard for Scripture, sound psychology techniques and a focus on practical applications for every day life. This book will also serve as an excellent resource for:

  • Pastors desiring to increase their pastoral counseling skills.
  • Therapists who would like to better understand how therapeutic tools fit
    into a Biblical world view.
  • Lay ministers wanting to use tools from Scripture and psychology to support people who are hurting.
  • Everyone looking to apply tools from the Bible and psychology to further
    their own personal growth.

What Others Are Saying:

"Knowing that marriage and family is the best “picture" God has given to His children in regards to the love and sacredness He desires to share with us, it is
encouraging to have a guide like Jed use his knowledge and life experience to
usher us through the clinical frame in order to get to the biblical heart of
where joy and peace can reside!"  

~ Doug Swink: Winning at Home Ministries

"Using principles of Psychology that affirm Biblical truths, Jed shares his own Journey of pushing through adversity to living a Christ-filled life. Jed shares not only his knowledge, but the wisdom that comes with having emptied himself before a loving God. So pour a fresh cup of coffee. Definitely worth the read!"

~ Chris Rader Author: Unconditional Dad: A Father and Pastor’s Journey Through the Words ‘Dad, I’m Gay.’

"For each of us, life is full of hurts.  Leaders especially know how pain can hinder our ability to love and serve.  If suffering has put you on the sidelines, then the healing insights offered by Mr. Jurchenko will certainly give you both the tools and encouragement you need to get back on track."

~ Dr. J.R. Miller, Author More Than Cake: 52 Mediations to Feed your Teams 

"Jed does a wonderful job with this book by taking all of us along on his
journey and sharing his story with us. If you grew up in the church, you will
probably relate with some of it and you will be blessed by the rest of it. This
book is definitely worth the read. "                                                                                       

~ Adam Smith ~ AGBeat Top 50 Influencer 2014.

About Me:

My name is Jed Jurchenko. I’m a licensed marriage and family therapist and psychology professor. I graduated from Southern California Seminary with a Masters of Divinity, then returned to complete a second master’s in psychology. I prefer to keeping things California casual and the majority of my free time is spent with my family. It’s my favorite place in the world to be. We especially enjoy spending time at the beach, going camping and BBQing.

                                        

As you can probably tell by now, I’m also extremely passionate about theology and psychology. I love sitting in our wide variety of eclectic coffee shops, reading up on the latest research. Exploring these to areas is both a career and a hobby! My favorite part teaching is watching student’s faces light up as they discover how psychology and Scripture work together to provide practical answers to life's challenges! If you have  questions about this project or would like to talk more, I would love to hear from you. You can e-mail me at jjjurchenko@socalsem.edu. If you would prefer to communicate by Skype, phone or text, send an e-mail with the best way to contact you and I'll connect with you within the week!

Why an Indiegogo campaign?

The book has been written and is receiving outstanding reviews from those who had the opportunity to take a sneak-peek. However, in order for publication to become a reality, additional groundwork needs to be laid in the form of editing, formatting, cover design and basic PR. The total cost of full publication is $7,500. With a growing family, including our daughter Addison due in early July, this is more than we are able to accomplish on our own. We would be honored to have you partner with us and you'll have the opportunity to pick-up some great perks alone the way! Whether you are praying for us, helping us pass on this message through e-mail, Facebook and Twitter or supporting us in moving forward with publication, we are thrilled to have you join us in spreading this life changing message!         

The Perks:

$15 - Team member! (e-book) Thank you for helping us spread this powerful message! You'll receive the full version of the e-book for your Kindle, Nook or e-reader, and your name in the book's acknowledgements thanking you for being a part of the vibrant team who made publication possible!

$24 - Star member! (Book) You are amazing, and to show my appreciation, I'll send you an early released, signed copy of the book thanking you in the acknowledgements! (add $5 for international shipping)

$30 – Rock-star team member! As one of our Rock-star team members, you'll receive all of the above perks, including: a signed copy of the book with your name in the acknowledgements, the inspirational e-book and a personal thank-you card!

$50 - The superhero! (Book and e-book) In addition to my sincere gratitude and all of the above perks, I would love to call and thank you personally!

$100 – Party member! (Book, e-book and BBQ) Our family would love to have you celebrate with us during a sunny San Diego, BBQ! The more the merrier and we would be honored to have you join us for this special occasion! The time and date will be announced after publication. Plus, you will receive all of the above perks as well!

$300 - Business Member! Let us say a special thank you to your small-business or church with ½ page acknowledgement. We really couldn’t do this without you! You’ll also receive a signed copy of the book, inspirational e-book and a personal thank you card for your generosity! All business member acknowledgements subject to author and publisher approval and must be in alignment with the overall positive, family oriented message of the book.

$500 – Rock-star Business Member!!! Wow! I am blown away by your support! Your church or organization will receive a full-page thank you in the book in addition to a signed copy of the book, the inspirational e-book and a personal thank you! Thank you for believing in us and this message! All business member acknowledgements subject to author and publisher approval and must be in alignment with the overall positive, family oriented message of the book.

Thank you again for your encouragement, support, and for teaming up with us in spreading this powerful, life-changing message.

Sincerely, Jed                                                                                   jjjurchenko@socalsem.edu                                                                                

 

Recent Blog Posts:

If you would like more information about the ideas in this book, you can check out my some of my recent guest blogger posts!

http://www.thesugarandspicelife.com/psychology-popcorn-chocolate-chips/

story:
Short Summary

Do you, or someone that you know, enjoy poetry? If you do, stop right where you are and take a gander into my soul with the words I've scrawled onto the pages of my new book. If you're looking to get a taste of my poetry, check out the samples in the gallery!

I'm Aster Lune and I've brought to life the words inside my heart, into a collection to share with the world. I am publishing this collection of poetry, through LuLu.com but wanted to allow pre-orders for those who are as excited as I am. However, they do not have a system yet that you can set up for pre-orders! So I asked myself, how can I make that available if my independent publisher does not offer it? Indiegogo came to mind! So here we are. The official release date for Collecting Stardust is May 23, 2014. Here, you can pick a from a few contribution options for your pre-order! (Note: $2000 is not necessarily the goal, I do not expect to necessarily reach, nor exceed that.)

Important note: I have requested to receive the funds by May 31st, which means the deadline to contribute and pre-order is May 12th. As soon as I receive the funds, I will be ordering them and then sending them all out signed and ready to go with each perk, as soon as they arrive at my house! So I can't guarantee a set date you will receive them. But if you send me your email address, and what your perk was, then as soon as I sent out your order I will send you tracking information! (to get in contact with me please email me here: asterlunewrites@gmail.com) Also: If you ordered one of the Starchunk perks, please please PLEASE let me know which one; because I forgot to label them separately to be able to differentiate who ordered which one! If I haven't heard from you by the end of the campaign, I will shoot you an email and ask you, so that way I don't send you the wrong order!

(On a final note, because I couldn't do it without these two people in particular: a huge thank you for the support and encouragement my best friend Brenden gave to me before he died. Finally a really big thank you to Heather from Little Ram Editing & Consulting for helping me through all of this! Couldn't do it without you two. You're the best! Check out Little Ram!)

What We Need & What You Get

All pre-ordered books come hand-signed. I want to make notice that those who pre-order will not necessarily receive them quickly (because of the way the funds in this is set up and so it depends on how quickly I receive it from Indiegogo). Because of that though, I want to try and offer you the best deals.

The first perk is not a book. This perk was designed for those of you who may not necessarily want the book or can't afford the book yet, but want to help contribute to my ability to do two things: provide cheaper (signed) books to those who pre-order (and the shipping cost to send it to them/you), as well as order a bulk amount of books to be able to bring around to local shops and bookstores. This first perk is a $5 poster card of a poem (of mine) of your choice.

The second perk is early release of the e-book Collecting Stardust. $10 will get you the e-book May 16, a week before the official release date.

The third perk is simply a hand signed copy of the paperback of Collecting Stardust. $15 will cover the book, signature, and shipping.

The fourth perk is a fun one. Since our release date is Lucky Penny Day, we wanted to incorporate some lucky pennies! For $20 I will personally handcraft bookmarks with lucky pennies attached, to include with your purchase of a hand-signed copy.

The fifth perk is for those who like to maximize their reading and sharing. If you would rather not have a bookmark, for $20 you could instead receive a hand signed paperback copy and for this limited time only, a copy of the e-book as well. For those of you who would like to have both the paperback and the e-book, this is the only time you will not have to pay full price for both!

The sixth and last perk jumps up significantly in price. This is split up into three separate prices (so it looks like 3 perks but it's all the same perk). For $50, $75, or $100, you receive all of the previous perks: a poster card poem of your choice, hand signed paperback copy, a bookmark, and an e-book. The bulk of this perk is to help support underlying costs for manufacturing, Indiegogo fees (they take a chunk out), shipping, editing, and design-- as well as future projects. An added bonus for this perk is: locals to the Humboldt County area (and possibly surrounding areas, depending on distance) can meet with and have lunch/brunch with me. People who are not local, can instead have a fun Skype session or hand written letter sent to them. In either situation, (lunch or skype/letter), I will let you in on a few secrets on upcoming news and projects! (And whatever funds are left from this project, gets split into being shoved away into a savings account for my kid, and for future projects)

The Impact

Writing is a wonderful way to express emotion, and is a great form of therapy. I've learned, through my own experience and hearing from others, that often times reading other's writing, inspires you to write or find ways to express yourself. Especially when you have read something that resonates deep within your heart and you relate to so strongly. My goal is for you, or someone you love, to read my writing and find something that resonates with you and inspires you to express yourself. When you feel a connection to someone's writing, you feel a connection to the writer; and you no longer feel alone. If you are going through a rough break up, dealing with the struggles of unrequited love or maybe a long distance relationship, or maybe feeling just completely depressed for reasons no one but you know; whatever it is, you're not alone. Through the hardest times, you can find comfort in writing and reading. If you're not a big reader, novels may not be for you. So perhaps you can find solace in the company of beautiful, powerful short pages filled with imagery and love, description and emotion. Poems vary in length, but are (generally) much shorter than novels or even novellas. You don't have to finish chapters, you just have to read a page or two and then you can come back later. You can skip around. They each tell their own story-- and so if novels aren't for you, maybe this is. I hope that this, and any future projects of mine, are able to reach a part of you that maybe you didn't realize was there; or didn't realize others experienced as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's a tough economy to live in right now. Being a young mom and student and only working part time, I understand that. Money is hard to come by, and these days everything costs money. So if you're not able to contribute even if you wanna, I completely understand! You can still help me out by spreading the word and sharing this with your friends. Even if they don't pre-order anything, they might know someone who wants to! The more people who see it, the more people it get's around to! I just want the word out. Thank you everyone for all your help and support!

As soon as I receive the funds, I will be ordering them and then sending them all out signed and ready to go with each perk, as soon as they arrive at my house! So I can't guarantee a set date you will receive them. But if you send me your email address, and what your perk was, then as soon as I sent out your order I will send you tracking information! (to get in contact with me please email me here: asterlunewrites@gmail.com) Also: If you ordered one of the Starchunk perks, please please PLEASE let me know which one; because I forgot to label them separately to be able to differentiate who ordered which one! If I haven't heard from you by the end of the campaign, I will shoot you an email and ask you, so that way I don't send you the wrong order!(On a final note, because I couldn't do it without these two people in particular: a huge thank you for the support and encouragement my best friend Brenden gave to me before he died. Finally a really big thank you to Heather from Little Ram Editing & Consulting for helping me through all of this! Couldn't do it without you two. You're the best! Check out Little Ram!)What We Need & What You GetAll pre-ordered books come hand-signed. I want to make notice that those who pre-order will not necessarily receive them quickly (because of the way the funds in this is set up and so it depends on how quickly I receive it from Indiegogo). Because of that though, I want to try and offer you the best deals.The first perk is not a book. This perk was designed for those of you who may not necessarily want the book or can't afford the book yet, but want to help contribute to my ability to do two things: provide cheaper (signed) books to those who pre-order (and the shipping cost to send it to them/you), as well as order a bulk amount of books to be able to bring around to local shops and bookstores. This first perk is a $5 poster card of a poem (of mine) of your choice.The second perk is early release of the e-book Collecting Stardust. $10 will get you the e-book May 16, a week before the official release date.The third perk is simply a hand signed copy of the paperback of Collecting Stardust. $15 will cover the book, signature, and shipping.The fourth perk is a fun one. Since our release date is Lucky Penny Day, we wanted to incorporate some lucky pennies! For $20 I will personally handcraft bookmarks with lucky pennies attached, to include with your purchase of a hand-signed copy.The fifth perk is for those who like to maximize their reading and sharing. If you would rather not have a bookmark, for $20 you could instead receive a hand signed paperback copy and for this limited time only, a copy of the e-book as well. For those of you who would like to have both the paperback and the e-book, this is the only time you will not have to pay full price for both!The sixth and last perk jumps up significantly in price. This is split up into three separate prices (so it looks like 3 perks but it's all the same perk). For $50, $75, or $100, you receive all of the previous perks: a poster card poem of your choice, hand signed paperback copy, a bookmark, and an e-book. The bulk of this perk is to help support underlying costs for manufacturing, Indiegogo fees (they take a chunk out), shipping, editing, and design-- as well as future projects. An added bonus for this perk is: locals to the Humboldt County area (and possibly surrounding areas, depending on distance) can meet with and have lunch/brunch with me. People who are not local, can instead have a fun Skype session or hand written letter sent to them. In either situation, (lunch or skype/letter), I will let you in on a few secrets on upcoming news and projects! (And whatever funds are left from this project, gets split into being shoved away into a savings account for my kid, and for future projects)The ImpactWriting is a wonderful way to express emotion, and is a great form of therapy. I've learned, through my own experience and hearing from others, that often times reading other's writing, inspires you to write or find ways to express yourself. Especially when you have read something that resonates deep within your heart and you relate to so strongly. My goal is for you, or someone you love, to read my writing and find something that resonates with you and inspires you to express yourself. When you feel a connection to someone's writing, you feel a connection to the writer; and you no longer feel alone. If you are going through a rough break up, dealing with the struggles of unrequited love or maybe a long distance relationship, or maybe feeling just completely depressed for reasons no one but you know; whatever it is, you're not alone. Through the hardest times, you can find comfort in writing and reading. If you're not a big reader, novels may not be for you. So perhaps you can find solace in the company of beautiful, powerful short pages filled with imagery and love, description and emotion. Poems vary in length, but are (generally) much shorter than novels or even novellas. You don't have to finish chapters, you just have to read a page or two and then you can come back later. You can skip around. They each tell their own story-- and so if novels aren't for you, maybe this is. I hope that this, and any future projects of mine, are able to reach a part of you that maybe you didn't realize was there; or didn't realize others experienced as well.Other Ways You Can HelpIt's a tough economy to live in right now. Being a young mom and student and only working part time, I understand that. Money is hard to come by, and these days everything costs money. So if you're not able to contribute even if you wanna, I completely understand! You can still help me out by spreading the word and sharing this with your friends. Even if they don't pre-order anything, they might know someone who wants to! The more people who see it, the more people it get's around to! I just want the word out. Thank you everyone for all your help and support!

story:
The Overland Trilogy. Premiering Book 3 - La Lucha!

Three books to inspire, educate and entertain. We Will Be Free (3rd edition, new content), Travel the Planet Overland (2nd edition, full colour softcover format) and a new novel, La Lucha! The Fight.

The Books

We Will Be Free

(eBook or Softcover - 6x9" USA and 13 x 21cm Europe)

We Will Be Free, first published in 2015, chronicles the challenges faced by our family as we extracted ourselves from the “real” world and set off to explore Africa and circumnavigate the South American continent in a Land Rover. Written with passion and from the heart, We Will Be Free is more than just another travel book, it is a manifesto, a declaration of independence! This will be the third edition of the book which will be updated with new maps and photographs.

Reviews

"An amazingly fun book! Warning: may make you hate your job and your sedentary life. May cause wanderlust and a desire to be outside seeing wondrous things". - M. Kinney.

“From the title to the very last page of the book, I was intrigued and entertained! It is full of unabashedly honest and hilarious metaphors describing life on the road and what it's like to be a part of the "overlanding tribe". - E. Lopez, Overland the Americas.

Travel The Planet Overland

(eBook or Softcover - 6x9" USA and 13 x 21cm Europe)

Travel the Planet Overland was written with the goal to inspire and inform how you too can travel the planet by vehicle and provides the guerilla tactics for your own liberation movement. Travel the Planet Overland was originally crowdfunded on Kickstarter  and was an incredible success. Once we have achieved our goal, we will redesign the book in a softcover format which will be more affordable for you and will fit right in with your travel gear.

Reviews

“There are quite a few books available proclaiming to be the ultimate edifier of all things overland. I’ve read only a few of them, skimmed over most - but enjoyed only one. That book is also the newest in the mix and gives hope for an otherwise dull literary genre”. - Christophe Noel, Managing Editor - Expedition Portal

La Lucha! The Fight

(eBook or Softcover - 6x9" USA and 13 x 21cm Europe)

La Lucha! The Fight, picks up where We Will Be Free ended and chronicles our overland journey across the Americas, from Ecuador to Alaska, down to Baja Mexico and across the USA over a two-year period. Included are the incredible stories of our rise, fall and rebirth, how we were one signature away from becoming millionaires and lost it all overnight, how we lived off the grid in the remote Mexican mountains for nine months and how we converted our Land Rover from a standard vehicle into an off-road capable, live-in camper in Florida before shipping her to the United Kingdom. You will read how we successfully reinvented ourselves as creatives in order to fund our journey.

Liberation is seldom achieved without a fight! La Lucha!

Reviews

"I commissioned one of my smarter personalities to review the book and she informed the rest of us that it is bloody brilliant, a masterpiece!" - Graeme Bell, Author

FEATURED BY

REFERRAL CONTEST

WHO WANTS A NEW SNOMASTER FRIDGE?

We have partnered with SnoMaster USA to offer one US resident, the opportunity to have a 42L AC/DC fridge/freezer, worth USD879 delivered to his or her home.  In order to qualify, you need to pledge towards our campaign, share this campaign with all your family, friends and even enemies, by means of a specific link and the individual that can get the most referrals to pledge, wins the fridge!  Rules and instructions can be found here.   We're working hard on getting something special together for other countries too!

OUR GOAL 

Our goal, through self-publishing and crowdfunding, is to achieve the independence and means to be able to continue to travel, educate and provide for our children, write and share our stories with the world. We will also be giving back to the community which supports us by donating books to various international libraries and Non-Government Organisations. Please let us know if you know of an organization which would benefit from such a donation and we will short list accordingly.

RISKS?

As this is our second crowdfunding campaign and our third self-published book, we have been able to "fine tune" the editing and printing process. Travel The Planet Overland was a superb product and we are able to reproduce the same quality in softcover.  As we are able to utilise a fulfillment centre in the USA and distribute the remaining books for Europe and the rest of the world personally, we are certain that the relevant book or books will be received timeously.  

FOLLOW US

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/a2a.expedition

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/graeme.r.bell

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Arg2Alaska

Website:   http://www.a2aexpedition.com/

story:
February 22, 2018 - Soooooo, about those stretch goals!

The Vulture Culture 101 IndieGoGo Campaign started a little over two weeks ago, and as of right this moment it’s at $2,723, which is 91% of the original $3,000 I asked for--THANK YOU!!!! Since you all have been so enthusiastic in supporting this, it’s only right that I put a couple of stretch goals out there:

--If the campaign reaches $4,000, I will have stickers of the above skull design printed! Everyone who will pledged at a level that includes physical items being sent to them up to that $4,000 mark will have a sticker tucked into their package at no extra cost. After we hit $4,000 I will open up additional perk levels where you can get the sticker (with or without the paperback book).

--If the campaign reaches $6,000, I will also produce a set of animal skull flash cards to help you with learning to identify some of the skulls you may encounter in Vulture Culture. Right now I’m looking at somewhere around 36-ish cards for the deck. If we reach the $6,000 mark, the deck will be automatically added at no extra charge to ALL pledges at the $100 Vulture Starter Kit level, the $250 Deluxe Vulture Starter Kit level, and the $500 Ultimate Vulture level. Additionally, I will add pledge levels where you can buy the paperback book and a set of flash cards.

Please note that I may have to push back order fulfillment a bit for orders with flash cards as it will take me extra time to design and print the cards.

At Last, A Book on Vulture Culture!

Hi, I'm Lupa! I am an artist, author, and naturalist in the Pacific Northwest. I've been working with hides and bones in my artwork and spirituality since 1998, and my first book on nature-based spirituality was published in 2004. Among my publications are Skin Spirits: The Spiritual and Magical Use of Animal Parts (Megalithica Books, 2010) and Skull Scrying: Animal Skulls in Divinatory Trance (self-published, 2015). I am also the creator of The Tarot of Bones deck and book set, which was funded through two wildly successful IndieGoGO campaigns in 2015 and 2016, and was officially released in 2017. I maintain a database of animal parts laws that is used by thousands of people every year, and I have run multiple events combining art and natural history (and skulls!)

Now I am turning my creative endeavors toward a new book project focusing on the "fandom" that has arisen around the collection and appreciation of hides, bones and other animal remains. Vulture Culture 101: A Book For People Who Like Dead Things is the first book solely focused on this subculture. While there are books out there concerning taxidermy, or animal bones, or hide tanning, Vulture Culture covers these topics and so much more! There will be information on how to find other Vultures, legalities and ethics, where to find specimens, and even how to get the smell of roadkill off your hands. Here's a working table of contents from the official website, http://www.vultureculture101.com:

Introduction
Chapter 1: Roots and Revival: Historical and Modern-Day Vultures
Chapter 2: The Successful Scavenger: Where Do I Get My Goods?
Chapter 3: Identifying Hides, Bones and More
Chapter 4: Here’s Where It Gets Messy: Processing Raw Specimens
Chapter 5: Put Your Best (Rabbit’s) Foot Forward: Displaying and Caring For Your Collection
Chapter 6: Vultures and Our Neighbors
Chapter 7: Rewilding the Beast: Vulture Culture as a Return to Nature
Conclusion
Appendix I: Further Resources
Appendix II: Recommended Nature-based Nonprofits

As of this campaign, I have written over 90% of the final manuscript, minus the guest essays (which I'll talk about in a minute!) I have a few more topics I want to cover here and there, but the bulk of the writing is done. My goal is to release the book in Summer of 2018, and you can help make that happen by backing this campaign on IndieGoGo!

Where's the Money Going?

Every dollar of the $3000 goal of this campaign will go directly into funding the production of Vulture Culture 101. Here's what I need to cover:

--Writers! I'll be using some of the funds to pay guest writers for how-to essays on topics like tanning and bone cleaning, since I'm more of a hide and bone artist than a hide and bone processor. (Look for a call for writers out on my social media once the IGG campaign is complete.)

--Books! As with The Tarot of Bones Companion Book, I'll be self-publishing and using CreateSpace as a platform. I'll need to print enough books to cover IndieGoGo backers, plus some more for general sales stock.

--Perks! While these are awesome extras for you, I still have to pay for their printing/materials/etc. and spend time putting together the handmade ones. 

--Shipping! Shipping costs will be factored in during your pledge process, but keep in mind I'll also need to pay to have the books shipped to me from the printer.

While the majority of costs will go to the production of the book, I will be donating a to-be-decided portion of the proceeds to nonprofit organizations that benefit wildlife and their habitats, such as the Xerces Society for Invertebrate Conservation and the Nature Conservancy. I am already a regular contributor to several of these organizations, including making monthly donations to some. While the exact amount I give varies from month to month depending on my income and expenses, I do what I can to help these organizations keep up their good work. 

About Those Perks...

So what sorts of goodies can you get by backing this campaign? Here are a few possibilities for you to choose from:

  • Vulture Culture 101 (of course!) - you'll be able to get a single copy, or two at a time (one for you, one for a friend!)
  • The Tarot of Bones, and other books I've written - you can have your choice of some or all of my previous, currently in print publications.
  • A Wearable Fox Tail - tails are one of my most popular handmade items; each one is made from a tail left over from garment manufacture, and each has a handmade attachment using secondhand leather from old jackets rather than a cheap ball chain or keychain.
  • Vulture Culture Starter Kits - featuring a nifty assortment of specimens; the actual contents of your kit will be a surprise, but expect goodies like fur, bones and more
  • Furs of North America Wall Hanging - this is a very limited perk, featuring a leather wall hanging with samples of several furs from North American mammals. (Note that some furs may be replaced with substitutes if they are not legal in your state.)
  • A wearable red fox, coyote or wolf headdress made from a whole hide complete with head, tail, paws and claws
  • A special thank you in the book and on the official website (you can opt out of one or both of these)
  • And more! Check the list of perks on the right.

If you can't decide which one you reallllly want, keep in mind you can claim multiple perks by making multiple contributions--more information here. 

Also, please remember that perk amounts include my costs for materials for fulfilling them, and also remember that IndieGoGo and Paypal will both take out part of the money for their fees!

(My apologies to non-US folks; due to customs restrictions I cannot ship anything made with wildlife parts outside of the US. Books are totally legal to ship worldwide, however!)

Now for a little more detail on some of these perks:

Books and Tarot

I've written and published several books prior to this project. You can choose to bring home one or more of these titles, shipped along with your copy of Vulture Culture 101 in Summer 2018:

Fang and Fur, Blood and Bone: A Primal Guide to Animal Magic

DIY Totemism: Your Personal Guide to Animal Totems

Skin Spirits: The Spiritual and Magical Uses of Animal Parts

New Paths to Animal Totems: Three Alternative Approaches to Creating Your Own Totemism

Plant and Fungus Totems: Connect With Spirits of Field, Forest and Garden

Nature Spirituality From the Ground Up: Connect With Totems in Your Bioregion

Please note that my anthologies are not included in this special offer. 

If you want just the Vulture Culture related titles, the Vulture Culture Book Lot includes Vulture Culture 101, Skin Spirits: The Spiritual and Magical Use of Animal Parts, Skull Scrying: Animal Skulls in Divinatory Trance, and The Tarot of Bones deck and book. If you just want Vulture Culture 101 and The Tarot of Bones, select the VC101 and Tarot of Bones package.

Tails and Ears

(Photo is a sample; exact items you get may vary.)

Tails and ears are among my most popular handmade creations, and I've sold thousands of both over the years. You can just get a fox tail with your copy of Vulture Culture 101, or select the Add a Tail and Ears, Please package to get a matched set of either coyote or red fox wearable ears and tail.

Vulture Culture Starter Kits

(Photo is a sample; exact items you get may vary.)

Want some dead things to go with your copy of Vulture Culture 101? Check out the Vulture Starter Kit and Deluxe VC Starter Kit perks! The exact contents of your kit are a surprise, but expect a nice variety of hide, bone and other nifty specimens. The Vulture Starter kit will have a good all-around basic collection; the Deluxe amps it up in both quality and quantity. Please note that state laws will determine what I can and can't include in your kit.

Furs of North America Wall Hanging

I made one of these several years ago, but it was stolen at a show before I was even able to put it on display. Now it's back as a special limited perk for this IndieGoGo campaign! A lovely piece of deerskin creates a backing for a variety of real fur samples from legal North American mammals. Please note that the wall hanging you receive will be larger and include more species (some species may not be available in your state due to legalities.) What you see here is just a small sampler to give you an idea of the concept.

Headdresses

I've been making full hide headdresses for over 15 years. Rather than using non-biodegradable taxidermy supplies, I create a lighter, more open style of headdress that can be worn for long periods of time comfortably. If you'd like a headdress to go with your copy of Vulture Culture 101, I have perk options for red fox, coyote, and wolf--check them out! 

Risks & Challenges

As I mentioned above, I have run two very successful IndieGoGo campaigns for The Tarot of Bones, both of which greatly exceeded their goals. 2015's campaign asked for $5,000 and made $10,143, and 2016's asked for $5,000 and made $5,800. Because this is a less elaborate project, consisting of a book rather than a deck and book, and requiring fewer raw materials for production, my overhead is lower. However, given that I was able to fund that much more expensive project, I am confident in my ability to successfully fund and release Vulture Culture 101. 

This is a flexible-funding campaign, which means that if I do not meet my goal, I still get the money (but IndieGoGo gets to keep a much larger percentage of it, 9% as opposed to 4%, not including Paypal's fees on top of that). Even if I don't raise $3,000, I will continue with the project with the goal of having the book released Summer 2018; the successful completion of this campaign will make that much easier. 

While the IndieGoGo campaign is not my sole source of funding for this project, it will allow me to divert a lot less money from my everyday income and help me compensate for the time that I spent working on Vulture Culture 101. In short, by backing this campaign you'll be helping me keep my bills paid and my belly full while I dedicate myself to this project.

Why Is This Project Important?

There are plenty of resources on Vulture Culture online, and there are books on how to do taxidermy, or how to identify skulls. However, they are scattered across libraries and the internet. Vulture Culture 101, while it will not be a completely exhaustive book on the subject (such a thing would be impossible!), is meant to be a well-rounded book on both Vulture Culture and the natural history specimens we enjoy. It gives readers both a good foundation in what Vulture Culture is, and how to get involved, from processing specimens to finding other Vultures.

It's also meant to be a book that you can hand to curious (but perhaps confused) friends and family who want to know more about why you're so interested in dead stuff. And it's a great read for people who just like unusual topics in their nonfiction perusals. 

But it's not just about us. It's also about how Vulture Culture is seated in the greater context of the natural world. We humans have an imperfect relationship with the rest of nature, all too often exploitative and acquisitive rather than balanced. So Vulture Culture 101 also challenges readers to examine their ethics, and to consider the impact of our interests. And it invites everyone to connect their natural history collection back to nature itself, and the responsibility we have to our ecological community. 

Do you want to see this book happen? Even if you can't back the campaign, please help spread the word! Use the share tools that IndieGoGo provides. Post a link on Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and elsewhere. Email people you think would be interested. Contact alternative, art and other media sources who may be interested in covering what I'm working on here (I have a press release available if you need it!) The more people who know about this campaign, the merrier--and the more we can share Vulture Culture with the world!

Thank you for all of your help,

Lupa

http://www.vultureculture101.com

IntroductionChapter 1: Roots and Revival: Historical and Modern-Day VulturesChapter 2: The Successful Scavenger: Where Do I Get My Goods?Chapter 3: Identifying Hides, Bones and MoreChapter 4: Here’s Where It Gets Messy: Processing Raw SpecimensChapter 5: Put Your Best (Rabbit’s) Foot Forward: Displaying and Caring For Your CollectionChapter 6: Vultures and Our NeighborsChapter 7: Rewilding the Beast: Vulture Culture as a Return to NatureConclusionAppendix I: Further ResourcesAppendix II: Recommended Nature-based Nonprofits
As of this campaign, I have written over 90% of the final manuscript, minus the guest essays (which I'll talk about in a minute!) I have a few more topics I want to cover here and there, but the bulk of the writing is done. My goal is to release the book in Summer of 2018, and you can help make that happen by backing this campaign on IndieGoGo!

Where's the Money Going?
Every dollar of the $3000 goal of this campaign will go directly into funding the production of Vulture Culture 101. Here's what I need to cover:
--Writers! I'll be using some of the funds to pay guest writers for how-to essays on topics like tanning and bone cleaning, since I'm more of a hide and bone artist than a hide and bone processor. (Look for a call for writers out on my social media once the IGG campaign is complete.)
--Books! As with The Tarot of Bones Companion Book, I'll be self-publishing and using CreateSpace as a platform. I'll need to print enough books to cover IndieGoGo backers, plus some more for general sales stock.
--Perks! While these are awesome extras for you, I still have to pay for their printing/materials/etc. and spend time putting together the handmade ones. 
--Shipping! Shipping costs will be factored in during your pledge process, but keep in mind I'll also need to pay to have the books shipped to me from the printer.
While the majority of costs will go to the production of the book, I will be donating a to-be-decided portion of the proceeds to nonprofit organizations that benefit wildlife and their habitats, such as the Xerces Society for Invertebrate Conservation and the Nature Conservancy. I am already a regular contributor to several of these organizations, including making monthly donations to some. While the exact amount I give varies from month to month depending on my income and expenses, I do what I can to help these organizations keep up their good work. 

About Those Perks...
So what sorts of goodies can you get by backing this campaign? Here are a few possibilities for you to choose from:


Vulture Culture 101 (of course!) - you'll be able to get a single copy, or two at a time (one for you, one for a friend!)
The Tarot of Bones, and other books I've written - you can have your choice of some or all of my previous, currently in print publications.
A Wearable Fox Tail - tails are one of my most popular handmade items; each one is made from a tail left over from garment manufacture, and each has a handmade attachment using secondhand leather from old jackets rather than a cheap ball chain or keychain.
Vulture Culture Starter Kits - featuring a nifty assortment of specimens; the actual contents of your kit will be a surprise, but expect goodies like fur, bones and more
Furs of North America Wall Hanging - this is a very limited perk, featuring a leather wall hanging with samples of several furs from North American mammals. (Note that some furs may be replaced with substitutes if they are not legal in your state.)
A wearable red fox, coyote or wolf headdress made from a whole hide complete with head, tail, paws and claws
A special thank you in the book and on the official website (you can opt out of one or both of these)
And more! Check the list of perks on the right.

If you can't decide which one you reallllly want, keep in mind you can claim multiple perks by making multiple contributions--more information here. 
Also, please remember that perk amounts include my costs for materials for fulfilling them, and also remember that IndieGoGo and Paypal will both take out part of the money for their fees!
(My apologies to non-US folks; due to customs restrictions I cannot ship anything made with wildlife parts outside of the US. Books are totally legal to ship worldwide, however!)
Now for a little more detail on some of these perks:
Books and Tarot

I've written and published several books prior to this project. You can choose to bring home one or more of these titles, shipped along with your copy of Vulture Culture 101 in Summer 2018:
Fang and Fur, Blood and Bone: A Primal Guide to Animal Magic
DIY Totemism: Your Personal Guide to Animal Totems
Skin Spirits: The Spiritual and Magical Uses of Animal Parts
New Paths to Animal Totems: Three Alternative Approaches to Creating Your Own Totemism
Plant and Fungus Totems: Connect With Spirits of Field, Forest and Garden
Nature Spirituality From the Ground Up: Connect With Totems in Your Bioregion
Please note that my anthologies are not included in this special offer. 
If you want just the Vulture Culture related titles, the Vulture Culture Book Lot includes Vulture Culture 101, Skin Spirits: The Spiritual and Magical Use of Animal Parts, Skull Scrying: Animal Skulls in Divinatory Trance, and The Tarot of Bones deck and book. If you just want Vulture Culture 101 and The Tarot of Bones, select the VC101 and Tarot of Bones package.
Tails and Ears

(Photo is a sample; exact items you get may vary.)
Tails and ears are among my most popular handmade creations, and I've sold thousands of both over the years. You can just get a fox tail with your copy of Vulture Culture 101, or select the Add a Tail and Ears, Please package to get a matched set of either coyote or red fox wearable ears and tail.
Vulture Culture Starter Kits

(Photo is a sample; exact items you get may vary.)
Want some dead things to go with your copy of Vulture Culture 101? Check out the Vulture Starter Kit and Deluxe VC Starter Kit perks! The exact contents of your kit are a surprise, but expect a nice variety of hide, bone and other nifty specimens. The Vulture Starter kit will have a good all-around basic collection; the Deluxe amps it up in both quality and quantity. Please note that state laws will determine what I can and can't include in your kit.
Furs of North America Wall Hanging

I made one of these several years ago, but it was stolen at a show before I was even able to put it on display. Now it's back as a special limited perk for this IndieGoGo campaign! A lovely piece of deerskin creates a backing for a variety of real fur samples from legal North American mammals. Please note that the wall hanging you receive will be larger and include more species (some species may not be available in your state due to legalities.) What you see here is just a small sampler to give you an idea of the concept.
Headdresses

I've been making full hide headdresses for over 15 years. Rather than using non-biodegradable taxidermy supplies, I create a lighter, more open style of headdress that can be worn for long periods of time comfortably. If you'd like a headdress to go with your copy of Vulture Culture 101, I have perk options for red fox, coyote, and wolf--check them out! 

Risks & Challenges
As I mentioned above, I have run two very successful IndieGoGo campaigns for The Tarot of Bones, both of which greatly exceeded their goals. 2015's campaign asked for $5,000 and made $10,143, and 2016's asked for $5,000 and made $5,800. Because this is a less elaborate project, consisting of a book rather than a deck and book, and requiring fewer raw materials for production, my overhead is lower. However, given that I was able to fund that much more expensive project, I am confident in my ability to successfully fund and release Vulture Culture 101. 
This is a flexible-funding campaign, which means that if I do not meet my goal, I still get the money (but IndieGoGo gets to keep a much larger percentage of it, 9% as opposed to 4%, not including Paypal's fees on top of that). Even if I don't raise $3,000, I will continue with the project with the goal of having the book released Summer 2018; the successful completion of this campaign will make that much easier. 
While the IndieGoGo campaign is not my sole source of funding for this project, it will allow me to divert a lot less money from my everyday income and help me compensate for the time that I spent working on Vulture Culture 101. In short, by backing this campaign you'll be helping me keep my bills paid and my belly full while I dedicate myself to this project.

Why Is This Project Important?
There are plenty of resources on Vulture Culture online, and there are books on how to do taxidermy, or how to identify skulls. However, they are scattered across libraries and the internet. Vulture Culture 101, while it will not be a completely exhaustive book on the subject (such a thing would be impossible!), is meant to be a well-rounded book on both Vulture Culture and the natural history specimens we enjoy. It gives readers both a good foundation in what Vulture Culture is, and how to get involved, from processing specimens to finding other Vultures.
It's also meant to be a book that you can hand to curious (but perhaps confused) friends and family who want to know more about why you're so interested in dead stuff. And it's a great read for people who just like unusual topics in their nonfiction perusals. 
But it's not just about us. It's also about how Vulture Culture is seated in the greater context of the natural world. We humans have an imperfect relationship with the rest of nature, all too often exploitative and acquisitive rather than balanced. So Vulture Culture 101 also challenges readers to examine their ethics, and to consider the impact of our interests. And it invites everyone to connect their natural history collection back to nature itself, and the responsibility we have to our ecological community. 
Do you want to see this book happen? Even if you can't back the campaign, please help spread the word! Use the share tools that IndieGoGo provides. Post a link on Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and elsewhere. Email people you think would be interested. Contact alternative, art and other media sources who may be interested in covering what I'm working on here (I have a press release available if you need it!) The more people who know about this campaign, the merrier--and the more we can share Vulture Culture with the world!
Thank you for all of your help,
Lupa
http://www.vultureculture101.com

story:
¡Hola! Esta es nuestra Campaña Libre.

Establecemos principios desde las convicciones en nuestros jóvenes, creando un espacio donde puedan reconocer y potenciar sus talentos y habilidades.

 

¿Cómo lo hacemos?

Producción de los elementos

Dividimos en dos los grupos de trabajo encargados de desarrollar los elementos:
El equipo de producción audiovisual se encarga de: Historias, series, cortos, clips, experimentos.

  • Elegimos una historia que creemos debe ser contada.
  • Desarrollamos durante varias sesiones de trabajo el contenido y material audiovisual.
  • Asignamos roles en la producción: Productores, Director y  camarógrafos.

El equipo de contenido se encarga de la investigación, escritura y desarrollo de: Conferencias, experiencias, reto, tips.

  • Evaluamos lugares donde podemos comunicar el mensaje.
  • Asignamos roles en la producción y ejecución: Facilitadores, camarógrafos.
  • Desarrollo de las conferencias.
  • Terminada la conferencia o experiencia, nos tomamos el tiempo de conocer y conversar con los jóvenes y explicar el proceso de becas y voluntariado.

 

Vence, nuestra campaña pasada, cerró con los siguientes resultados:

 

Nos dimos cuenta de que hay MUCHO por hacer y TÚ eres importante en esta transformación:

 

¿Qué queremos?


Aprovechar todos los espacios posibles con un mensaje que proyecte un futuro alentador, donde todos somos parte del proceso de construcción.

 

¿Cómo se distribuye tu aporte?

 

En 6 meses de campaña haremos:

  • 10 Cortos libres
  • 4 Experiencias de servicio
  • 2 Experimentos sociales
  • 3 Historias 
  • 40 Micros para radios
  • 40 clips (Videos para redes sociales)
  • 5 Filminutos YouTube
  • 35 Conferencias (15 Universidades, 10 colegios, 10 liceos públicos)

Sigue nuestro trabajo más de cerca en nuestra pagina web www.fundacionh2d.org

 

¿Por qué creemos en esto?

Sabemos que Venezuela tiene gran potencial, pero es necesario vencer la desesperanza desde algo que perdure. Estamos apuntando a la transformación duradera.

story:
The first step is always the hardest. Fortunately, that part is done. My first collection of poems and photographs, titled "Far from Luck," was published in 2011 by Lucky Bat Books:http://www.luckybatbooks.com/2011/09/charles-ohay/

Kirkus Reviews noted that the poems "showcase the author's sharp eye and sardonic wit" and summarized the collection as "gritty, darkly comic and poignant."

The full Kirkus review can be seen at:
https://www.kirkusreviews.com/book-reviews/char...

For the past 18 months, I've been at work creating the poems and images for my second collection, "Smoking in Elevators." Unlike the prior book—where all editing, design, and layout costs were covered by the publisher—I must now cover these costs myself.  I will be working with the same talented and experienced editor/designer with whom I worked on my last book. Whatever funds you contribute to the project will go to covering her time, labor, and expenses. If I don't reach my fundraising goal, the money raised still goes to my editor/designer.

No contribution is too small. All are greatly appreciated.

story:
Short Summary  (French description below)

I am Angelique Papadelias, the managing director of Little Screen Big Screen. I am from Sydney Australia and for the last few years, I have been residing in New York and Quebec, Canada. 

I have spent the last few months with one incredibly determined woman (Line Chaloux) from Quebec and Ten refugee families from Africa, Bhutan/ Nepal, Kosovo and Colombia. During this time, these families trusted me to capture their life stories about what happened, where they came from and how they got here now. This has been a rare opportunity because many people know that refugees risk their lives telling details of their history. These stories expose the truth about what is happening on the ground level to these local people, and their stories take us on a journey through their home towns, the torture they experienced from the brutal militiamen and their displacement to another country. It really highlights the depth of their faith to survive all they have endured. 

(Pictured: Angelique with Lachuman and his family  from Bhutan / Nepal)


Excerpt from the book - Lachuman: 

" At times when the rain and winds came, the water would drip inside the hut and soak our beds. We couldn’t sleep as everything was saturated. When the wind blew the plastic off our roof we couldn’t go to school the next day due to not having had sufficient sleep. Times were tough on everybody and once the rain stopped, we had to dry our beds. They would give us more bamboo, another plastic sheet and my brothers would help my father construct another shelter. This process took 2-3 days.
The hospital in the camp was very basic and there was a constant lack of doctors and a scarcity of food and water. The UN would transport food trucks to the camp and distribute food such as rice, oil, onions, pumpkin, chilli, lentils and bananas. It was up to us to buy meat and other vegetables with the little money we could get from small jobs. We could not leave the camp to get other food so whatever we were given, we accepted. When the water ran out, we would have no water to cook rice so we could not eat sufficiently and had poor nutrition, which led to a lack of concentration at school and hunger pains.  Years later, the UN started to provide us with breakfast at the school which was cooked in a small kitchen and could be best described as ‘wheat powder’ porridge. Life at the time was like that of a camel living in the dessert without food but carrying water on its back to survive…. and at many times, without the water.

My father needed to earn some money for us so he became a ‘pastor’ in the camp. We were of the Hindu faith. He would walk to peoples’ homes, reading and praying with them and they would give him a small amount of money for his services.  That money was used for our food."


This campaign is important to me and all the people involved because we are currently in a period of time where the world is in turmoil, and inspiration, hope and faith is crucial to our well being. Supporting this campaign will allow us to reach out to people and touch their hearts with these real life experiences. 

(Pictured: Line with her mother and statue of her three aunts: All nuns)

What We Need & What You Get

I would love to make the book available in English, French and Spanish so that all the refugee families involved can have it available in their native language and share it with others globally. I need all the versions of the book reviewed with final edits, as well as the book cover designed, and all the interior designs completed for all three versions. 


We are asking for $23,000  of our $40,000 target to get this project to the next stage so we can approach potential publishers globally. The funds will go to the people required to finish this project professionally (as mentioned above). So far, we have had nearly 30 volunteers from Australia and Canada to get the project to this point. They are amazing individuals. 

(Pictured: Valerie - Liaison who organized all the refugee meetings)


Any person that donates up to $100 will get a free copy of the ebook upon release and donations above $100 will automatically get a paperback version of the book delivered to them, as well as their names acknowledged within the book / website. Any large contributions will receive free publicity on our website.

I need to meet professional translators, designers, and e-book conversion specialists that can help complete the book set up. I need as many people to know about this project so that the biggest publishers and marketers are interested to help me share this book with the world. I would like the media to be inspired to talk about the project, radio hosts to engage with the stories, journalists to write about the project and people like Kyle and Jackie O, Studio 10, Sunrise, The Circle, SMH, Celine Dion, Angelina Jolie, Ellen and Oprah to be excited about the project and share it with their audiences. 

The Impact

This book is educational, inspirational and will leave you feeling a deep sense of compassion towards these beautiful families that I have had the honor to meet with and embrace. One woman worked tirelessly throughout her life to set up one of the refugee / immigration centers in Quebec to allow the Government and United Nations to send refugees to that area.  I am a proud Australian Author and I want to complete this book and share it with a world audience because these stories are the same for all refugees globally, regardless of whether they are sent to the USA, Canada, Europe or Australia. I need your help to get this project finished and published. 

There are still many negative attitudes in communities world wide in relation to the ongoing issues with the huge refugee crisis in the world. When you take a moment to really understand who they are, and walk in their shoes for one moment, you will see that attitude fade. With a deeper understanding of the human race, together we can make a difference. 

I am determined to have a successful launch of this book. If you would like to view my last book released, titled Arjun Rising, you will find that available on Amazon. You can also view my website www.littlescreenbigscreen.com to see other successful projects I have completed. 

      (Pictured:  Lachuman's family inside the camp in Nepal)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially, that doesn't mean you cannot help. We need promoters, marketers, media contacts and people like you to be excited about the project and support it by sharing it with your friends. 

If anyone knows of any business men/women and/or philanthropists globally - I would love to personally give these ten families some more clothes for their children, a new computer for their homework, and by a miracle, a family car to get their basic needs met during the cold, snowy winter days and nights. I can film the event of giving these items and turn it into a documentary of how the kindness of human beings can change peoples lives. 

Thank you for your time and support and please give us a helping hand today and put a smile on another face.

(Pictured: Veronique, Sihem and Annie helping launch the campaign)


                       French Description 


Ces derniers mois, j'ai accompagné une canadienne québécoise admirable, ainsi que dix familles réfugiées d'Afrique, du Bhoutan/Népal, du Kosovo et de la Colombie. Pendant le temps que j'ai passé avec eux, ces familles m'ont fait confiance et m'ont laissé témoigner de leurs histoires de vie, de ce qui s’est passé, d'où ils sont venus et de comment ils sont arrivés ici.

Ce fut une rare occasion, car beaucoup d'entre nous savons que les réfugiés risquent souvent leur vie en racontant ce qui leur est arrivé.

Ces histoires dévoilent la vérité sur ce qui arrive à ces gens sur le terrain. Elles nous emportent dans un voyage à travers leur village d'origine, la torture subie à la main de miliciens violents et leur périple vers un nouveau pays. Elles mettent vraiment en évidence la profondeur de leur foi, qui leur a permis de survivre à tout ce qu'ils ont enduré.

(Pictured: Rupa with her brother - refugees from Bhutan / Nepal)

Ce livre est éducatif, inspirant et vous laissera un profond sentiment de compassion envers ces merveilleuses familles que j'ai eu l'honneur de rencontrer et de côtoyer.

Une femme a travaillé sans relâche toute sa vie pour mettre sur pied un des centres pour réfugiés et immigrants au Québec qui accueillent des réfugiés reconnus par le gouvernement et les Nations Unies.

Je suis une fière auteure australienne et je veux compléter ce livre et le partager avec un public international, car ces histoires se répètent pour tous les réfugiés autour du monde, qu'ils soient envoyés aux États Unis, au Canada, en Europe ou en Australie. J'ai besoin de votre aide pour mener à terme ce projet et publier ce livre.

J'aimerais beaucoup que ce livre soit disponible en anglais, en français et en espagnol, pour que toutes les familles réfugiées qui y figurent puissent le lire dans leur langue et puissent le partager partout dans le monde. Il faut que toutes les versions du livre soient révisées jusqu'à leur version finale, et que la conception de la couverture et de tous les détails intérieurs soient complétés pour les trois versions. Je devrai rencontrer des traducteurs professionnels, des graphistes, ainsi que des spécialistes en publication électronique qui pourront m'aider à finaliser la mise au point du livre. J'ai besoin que le plus de gens possible soient au courant du projet pour que les plus grandes maisons d’édition et agences de marketing s'intéressent au projet et m'aident à diffuser ce livre à travers le monde entier.

(Pictured: Angelique with Line Chaloux whilst capturing her story)

Je souhaite que le projet suscite la couverture des médias, que les animateurs de radio soient interpellés par les histoires, que les journalistes écrivent sur le projet et que des personnes comme Celine Dion, Ginette Reno, Quebec TV personalities, Daniele Henkel, Angelina Jolie, Ellen et Oprah se prennent d'intérêt par le projet et le partagent avec leurs publics.

Nous espérons dépasser le montant cible pour garantir que le livre soit disponible dans les trois langues et le promouvoir auprès des maisons d’édition et des médias internationaux. Il n'y a pas de limite aux fonds que nous souhaitons amasser car le plus d'argent nous avons en parrainage, le mieux nous pourrons partager cette merveilleuse œuvre avec le monde.

Si vous connaissez des gens d'affaires ou des philanthropes à travers le monde, j'aimerais beaucoup pouvoir donner à ces dix familles des vêtements pour leurs enfants, un nouvel ordinateur pour faire leurs devoirs, et, qui sait, peut-être même une voiture familiale pour subvenir à leurs besoins de base pendant les hivers froids et enneigés. Je pourrai filmer l'événement de remise de ces items et en faire un documentaire sur comment la bonté humaine peut transformer la vie de quelqu'un.

Merci de votre temps et de votre appui.

Aidez-nous aujourd'hui et faîtes naître un sourire sur un autre visage.


(NOTE: French Description provided by David M. Da Silva)


Merci, 

Angelique Papadelias

Email: faithinourfreedom@yahoo.com

www.littlescreenbigscreen.com

www.FaithinourFreedom.com

https://www.facebook.com/faithinourfreedom

https://twitter.com/faithnrfreedom

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=etp3Jzezppk
